definition: also/too/(in Classical Chinese) final particle implying affirmation

sentences.english: Perhaps they spent time in the yard.
sentences.chinese: 也許他們在院子裏打發時光。

sentences.english: She may be not much, just want to let you stay with her.
sentences.chinese: 她也許要的不多，只是想讓你陪陪她。

sentences.english: Perhaps this corroborates what we say.
sentences.chinese: 也許這證實了我們的說法。

sentences.english: B. That's fine. May be I should have boiled eggs.
sentences.chinese: 好吧，也許我喫水煮蛋算了。

sentences.english: In this way, it might be possible to turn shields—instead of swords—into plowshares .
sentences.chinese: 也許可以把防禦用的盾牌變成鋤頭。

sentences.english: I believe someone else suggested it would make a good doormat.
sentences.chinese: 也許會有人說不如把它放在門口做個地墊。

sentences.english: And maybe they continue to improve their arsenals.
sentences.chinese: 也許他們會繼續改進其核武庫。

sentences.english: Back to the room to sleep, you may have seen her with the quilt, the mother.
sentences.chinese: 回房睡覺，也許你已見她加上的被子，那個是母親。

sentences.english: Perhaps, this is the unbending youth from northeast of China.
sentences.chinese: 也許這就是一個北方大男孩的那種倔強吧？

sentences.english: Perhaps you can explain why the Dustmen want me dead.
sentences.chinese: 也許你能解釋死亡者想要殺死我的原因。

sentences.english: Maybe some newsy remembers an odd customer.
sentences.chinese: 也許哪個賣報的還記得這麼個古怪的顧客。

sentences.english: TITANIA Perchance till after Theseus ' wedding-day.
sentences.chinese: 也許要到忒修斯的婚禮以後。

sentences.english: It might be their own products, or the products of other websites.
sentences.chinese: 這些也許是他們自己的產品，或者其他網站的產品。
但是科技，也許纔是不朽。

sentences.english: Anderson has the attitude for comedy, but not the aptitude.
sentences.chinese: 導演有對於喜劇片的態度，但是也許並不正確。

sentences.english: Mayhap , they will rebirth the soul of a nation.
sentences.chinese: 也許，一個國家的靈魂也會因此重生。

definition: after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
only/merely/nothing but/no more than/it's just that ...
but/yet/however/while/to go back/to decline/to retreat/nevertheless/even though
only natural/as it should be/certainly/of course/without doubt
